action.action-desc: Mr. Mast introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to vehicle weight limitations, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Freedom to Haul Act.
Section 127 of title 23, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: A vehicle limited or prohibited under this section from operating on a segment of the Interstate System that is a 5 axle tractor combination vehicle may operate on such a segment if such vehicle—

subparagraph.text: has a gross vehicle weight of 97,000 pounds or less;
has 3 rear axles on the tractor of such vehicle; and
other than gross vehicle weight, complies with the single axle, tandem axle, and bridge formula limits set forth in subsection (a).
